data_variables.name: actual
data_variables.description: A list representing the actual correct answer, in this case containing a single element.

data_variables.name: predicted
data_variables.description: A list representing predicted values, varying in different instances to demonstrate the output of the MAP@K calculation.

data_flow.created: Defined as a list with one correct answer.
data_flow.flows: Used as the ground truth in AP@K and MAP@K calculations.

data_flow.created: Defined and modified multiple times to show different prediction scenarios.
data_flow.flows: Used in conjunction with 'actual' for calculating AP@5 and MAP@K metrics.
